channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: 10 Essential Guidelines For Enterprise-Ready AI Solutions
item.description: The goal of AI governance guidelines remains consistent: Build trust, ensure compliance and mitigate risks associated with AI-powered solutions.

item.title: Write for someone
item.description: It’s so tempting to write for everyone. But everyone isn’t going to read your work, someone is. Can you tell me who? Precisely? What did they believe ...

item.title: U.S. And U.K. Political Donation Sites Put User Data At Risk
item.description: Political donors in the U.S. and U.K. are being left vulnerable thanks to poor security practices by political parties.

item.title: The steep part of the mountain
item.description: The end of the trail is usually difficult, but without the long and winding approach, there isn’t much of a mountain. The greatest hits reel and the s...

item.title: Bezos Vs. Musk: Billionaire Space Race Heats Up With NASA Mars Mission Reveal
item.description: Blue Origin, founded by Jeff Bezos, has announced plans to launch its New Glenn rocket for the first time on Sunday, Oct. 13 as NASA heads for Mars.

item.title: “How can I help?”

item.title: Oasis Live 2025 Reunion Tour Tickets—Scam Warning Issued

item.title: The sad compromise of “sponsored results”

item.title: The Faulty Link Between Postponed EVs And Software-Defined Vehicles
item.description: Electrification has slowed down significantly, but that's created an accidental delay to the rollout of software-defined vehicles, which will have oth...

item.title: The missing file
item.description: It contained some of my best writing. Cogent, clear and powerful. I found it. It wasn’t nearly as good as I remembered. In fact, it was hardly useful....
